moves.1. c4:
second game with white against Ancientart. he won the last one, i won the first with black... Maybe we should play a last one after this one.
My favorite c4...
moves.1... Nf6 2. Nf3 g6 3. Nc3 Bg7 4. d4 O-O: last time, i played Be3 and lost against the same player... I decided to change the idea, the complete game
moves.7... e5: but he insisted to play the same game...
moves.12. Nxe5 dxe5 13. Be3 Nf4: nightmare is coming... he wants to complicate, but I sensed this time I could be better after the big exchanges
moves.15. Raxd1 exf4: I have a knight, a pawn on e4 and the pawn on b2 threatened... but he cannot take all of them and, actually,  i won't let him to
moves.17... Rb8: i think he should have let me the rook, finding an escape for the king and... well i don't know...
moves.19. Bd3 Re7 20. Ne8: and this is my second key! wow, did you see it? all the threats?
moves.20... f5 21. c5: and here is my final key
moves.22. Nd6: well i will be over for at least a piece, now... ancientart resigned...
